summary: Completed comprehensive testing of F1 Fast Lap Challenge System with new authentication and admin features. All core functionality tested successfully including public/admin separation, JWT authentication, admin setup, protected routes, lap time management, event status control, track management, and mobile responsiveness.

design_issues.issue: Admin button click intercepted by 'Made with Emergent' overlay

passed_tests: Backend API connectivity (36/36 tests passed - 100% success rate)
Public leaderboard page loads correctly at / (fullscreen, mobile-optimized)
Admin login page accessible at /admin with proper form elements
First admin setup flow (create account when no admin exists)
Admin setup redirects to /admin/dashboard after successful creation
JWT authentication with proper token validation and expiration
Protected admin dashboard requires authentication
Add lap time functionality in admin dashboard (with/without team)
Team toggle functionality (show/hide team input field)
Edit lap time entries via edit dialog with validation
Delete single lap entries with confirmation dialog
Event status management (inactive/scheduled/active/finished)
Event status banner displays correct messages on public page
Track management (add/delete tracks) in admin panel
CSV export functionality from public page
PDF export functionality from public page (opens print dialog)
Logout functionality redirects to login page
Mobile responsive design (390x844 viewport tested)
Auto-refresh functionality on public leaderboard (10-second interval)
Proper error handling and validation (invalid credentials, time formats)
German UI labels throughout application
Dark racing theme with F1-style design
Leaderboard ranking and gap calculations
Protected routes return 401 for unauthorized access
Public endpoints accessible without authentication
Time format validation (MM:SS.mmm format)
Real-time data synchronization between admin and public pages
